pages.text: Both the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$() and the automation-based $(l:crafting/runic_crafter)runic crafter$() can be automated with a dispenser containing a knife.$(br2)A redstone signal applied to the dispenser will begin the crafting process, if there is an eligible recipe.$(br2)$(info) With the runic crafter drawing ingredients from the chest below it, simple automation of crafting recipes is easy.
